name: Tuff Girl!
description:
Ready for the most challenging race ever? 

It's easy to play: Just tap & hold to pull the objects with your hair, but do not forget to watch out that, because it may break off!

Tens of objects and levels are waiting for you to show your hair power to all!
publishers: PB BILISIM TEKNOLOJI YAZILIM SAGLIK HIZMETLERI VE DANISMANLIK LIMITED SIRKETI
